title: Mirage Gaming Seeking plat top laner
body:
Mirage gaming is seeking a plat top laner to finish the remainder of the DMG G-P League season. We will be holding tryouts today (10/18) from 8-11 pm EST, to join you can 

1) Add Leonîdas or Dà Man
or
2) fill out this application https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1yceqvgezIXlQ5qeN1TRehZsbAjcctikJod-ThF8-bm8/edit
